articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Kanggye General Tractor Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Kanggye General Tractor Plant
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Kanggye General Tractor Plant. 
					He went round the revolutionary museum first. 
					
					Watching for a long while the photos of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il displayed in the lobby of the revolutionary museum, he said that they attached great importance to this plant as it plays an important role in developing the nation's machine-building industry.
					
					He watched the words of the song of the plant displayed there. He asked the manager and the secretary of the party committee of the plant to sing the song. He praised them for singing the song well, his face beaming with a broad smile. It was a good song as it reflected the spirit of the workers of the plant, he added. 
					
					He recalled that Kim Jong Il regarded the plant as important and showed particular loving care for it in his lifetime. 
					
					Kim Jong Un praised the plant for conducting effective education of its employees in the leadership exploits of the great men of Mt. Paektu after building the revolutionary museum well. Noting that it is a good center for education, he said it stands out in a sharp contrast to the plant he criticized while visiting it a few days ago.
					
					He dropped in at the products show hall to see machines manufactured by the plant and learn about the development of new type products. 
					
					He expressed satisfaction over the fact that the plant manufactured new modern machines of Korean style by its own efforts and with indigenous technology. 
					
					It is good to have the spirit of buckling down to the work full of confidence, not disappointed in any difficulties, he said, asking what is necessary for the modernization of the plant. He took benevolent measures.
					
					He went round the processing and assembling shops to learn in detail about production there. 
					
					At the processing shop, he praised the plant for keeping the production site neat and tidy. He was pleased to see varieties of machine parts being churned out from modern machines and presses standing in lines at the work sites. 
					
					After watching workers of the plant using a modern spinning machine presented to Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un as a gift, he appreciated the intense loyalty of its workers to the Party.
					
					At the assembling shop he encouraged the workers and technicians devoting their wisdom and enthusiasm to the production of machines. Walking a compound of the plant, he praised its workers for keeping their work sites neat and tidy. He called for intensifying the work to spruce up the inside of the plant like a palace and its outside like a park.
					
					He made the round of the swimming pool and gymnasium newly built by the plant.
					
					He praised officials of the plant and a relevant field for having made devoted efforts to provide its workers with ample conditions for cultural rest.
					
					"I am very pleased to see the modern swimming pool and gymnasium," he said, adding that the longer one watches the plant, the more it looks attractive.
					
					Going round the canteen in the compound and a bean processing factory, he learned about supply service.
					
					At the dining room he was very pleased to hear that the plant has detailed plans for daily service, monthly special service, service to couples of innovators, service to mothers and service on birthdays and service is given according to them.
					
					 Stressing once again that supply service means a battle for defending socialism, he urged the officials to pay primary attention to the work for improving the standards of material and cultural life of the workers.
					
					"I am most pleased when I visit any plant which is successful in supply service," he added.
					
					He met with the labor innovators of the plant and had a photo session with them.
					
					He watched a grand chorus "Our Plant Shining with the Bloodline of Mt. Paektu" presented by workers of the plant. He congratulated them on their successful performance.
					
					"I drew great strength while watching the performance. It helped me renew the resolution to more successfully make revolution with our reliable workers in the future," he noted.
					
					He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Kang Kwan Il, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon and Kim Thaek Gu and Ryu Yong Sop, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Railways of DPRK Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Railways of DPRK Back Home
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Ministry of Railways of the DPRK led by Minister Jon Kil Su came back home on Friday after taking part in the 41st ministerial meeting of Railways of the Organization of Railways Cooperation held in Estonia.

articles.title: 16th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Closes
articles.content:
16th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Closes
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The 16th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize was closed. It was opened on June 13.
					The Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do Team proved successful in Taekwon-Do and go at the championship to come first in the events.
					
					A closing ceremony took place at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Expansion Project for Kosan Fruit Farm at Full Swing
articles.content:
Expansion Project for Kosan Fruit Farm at Full Swing
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Those involved in the expansion project for the Kosan Fruit Farm are pressing ahead with the work, greatly inspired by the "Masikryong Speed" the soldier-builders are creating in the skiing ground project on Masik Pass. 
					Their tasks to be carried out this year include the construction of more than 500 dwelling houses and scores of public buildings and setting up of more than 100 000 concrete props.
					
					They have mass-produced various kinds of roofing tiles and bar steels at field bases built by themselves.
					
					Kim Myong Hwa, a member of the shock brigade there, told KCNA that they produce 900 odd concrete props a day in the spirit of "Masikryong Speed".
					
					They also built a cement factory by themselves, which is greatly conducive to supplying kinds of bricks and other building materials for the project.

articles.title: More Rallies Held at Industrial Establishments, Co-op Farms
articles.content:
More Rallies Held at Industrial Establishments, Co-op Farms
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Employees of factories and enterprises and members of co-op farms in various parts of the country held rallies to vow to devotedly carry out the important tasks set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un in his historic appeal and to respond to the letter sent by the Sepho tableland reclaimers to the people across the country.
					The appeal sent by Kim Jong Un was conveyed at the rallies.
					
					Then the letter was read out.
					
					Speeches were made there. 
					
					The speakers underlined the need to live up with successes in production to the trust and expectation of the party by learning from the spirit and work style of the creators of the "Masikryong Speed".
					
					They said they would take thorough measures for the supply of fuel and raw materials, conduct a dynamic movement for technical innovations and bring about a boost in production so that the people might receive more quality goods.
					
					They pledged to make strenuous efforts to establish cultured practices in production and life as required by the Songun era and sincerely help the soldier-builders in the construction sites of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground.
					
					They underlined the need for the farmers to boost the production of grain, livestock products, fruits, etc. in the same spirit as displayed by the soldier-builders in construction sites of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground and turn their farms into a fairy land under socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Characterized by Comradeship
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Characterized by Comradeship
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was a great man possessed of comradeship as a gifted trait. 
					The nearly five decades of his leadership over the Workers' Party of Korea clearly showed that the politics based on comradeship always emerges victorious.
					
					His ceaseless inspection tours of military and economic units in his lifetime were prompted by his desire to share the weal and woe with the army and people.
					
					With this desire, he went to meet soldiers in Mt. Osong over the Chol Pass and Panmunjom, the areas in a hailing distance from the enemy's positions, and had photos taken with soldiers with feelings of kinship.
					
					When visiting a newly-married family of a discharged soldier, Kim Jong Il unreservedly gratified his pregnant wife requesting him to make a name for her soon-to-be-born child.
					
					He made time to read all of letters sent by people and reply to them.
					
					His absolute trust in the army and the people led to the birth of the Songun (military-first) politics and the development of the Korean People's Army into an invincible army.
					
					Comradeship between the leader and his people made the DPRK successfully conclude the arduous march, the forced march and dash toward the rosy future of a powerful nation.
					
					This comradeship has been creditably carried forward by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are now energetically pushing ahead with the building of a thriving nation, closer rallied around him on the basis of comradeship.

articles.title: Wonsan Aesculus Turbinata
articles.content:
Wonsan Aesculus Turbinata
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Aesculus turbinata, listed as a natural asset, is growing on the campus of Wonsan University of Agriculture.
					Planted in Juche 18 (1929), the crown-shaped broadleaf tree stretches into three trunks at the height of five meters.
					
					Face to face, each of the leaves breaks into seven oval-shaped folioles.
					
					The tree gets blossom in May, with each flower having one pistil and seven stamens.
					
					Its fruit that gets ripe in September is abundant in starch.
					
					The species of tree is considered to be good as garden tree.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Group for Kidnapping Citizens of DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Group for Kidnapping Citizens of DPRK
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces have become all the more undisguised in their acts of alluring and abducting citizens of the DPRK.
					Recently the puppet forces tried to let agents of the Intelligence Service and flesh traders allure and kidnap a dozen of youngsters of the DPRK.
					
					It was disclosed shortly ago that flesh traffickers tried to take away teenagers of the DPRK to south Korea. However, the "Saenuri Party" and other right-wing conservative forces of south Korea are taking issue with the DPRK over "human rights abuse". They have become busy protesting those countries which helped the return of the teenagers to the DPRK.
					
					It is a product of the sinister attempt to cover up the crime of kidnapping with the veil of "human rights" and fan up the frenzy for escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen in a worldwide scale.
					
					The act of alluring and kidnapping citizens of the DPRK including teenagers is a hideous human rights abuse engineered by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					In fact, the U.S. administration and Congress solicited other regional countries for "protection", expressing their special concern over the abduction of young people.
					
					Park Geun Hye, expressing regret over the failed abduction program, checked the whole process of the operation of alluring and kidnapping citizens of the DPRK in a "crisis management room" in the underground air-raid shelter of Chongwadae.
					
					The puppet Intelligence Service has so far instigated criminal organizations specializing in the abduction to conduct vicious acts against the DPRK in China and other countries. 
					
					It painted criminal organizations as "NGOs" and veiled their anti-DPRK smear campaign with the words of "human rights" and "humanitarianism".
					
					According to the teenagers who came back to the embrace of the DPRK after being allured and kidnapped, flesh traders who were disguised as religionists held in a hide-out dozens of teenagers of the DPRK whom they kidnapped in the northern border of the DPRK and put them through religious education and brainwashing.
					
					All those youngsters were not normal in their mental and physical conditions as they had long been secluded from the outside world. However, the south Korean group trumpets about "human rights abuses" reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					The puppet group set afloat a bad rumor that the DPRK will execute or send to concentration camp those "young defectors" and talked such rubbish that "the north should ensure the life and security of those taken to the north under escort".
					
					It is ludicrous for them to trumpet about "human rights" as they sought to sell off to the alien land children of tender age.
					
					Not only those young returnees but even those who once deserted the homeland being taken in by the appeasement of the enemies are unanimous in their voices that only contempt and maltreatment await those who deserted hometown and homeland and that Korean-style socialism full of loving care and warm feelings is the best in the world.
					
					The more desperate the puppet group becomes in its moves for alluring and abducting citizens of the DPRK, the more clearly it will disclose its dirty nature as human rights criminal.
					
					The puppet group should immediately stop the unethical farce aimed to undermine the single-minded unity in the DPRK and tarnish the bright image of Korean-style socialism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Deals with Juche Character, National Identity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Deals with Juche Character, National Identity
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Preserving the Juche character and national identity serves as a fundamental principle for accomplishing the cause of socialism, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					Leader Kim Jong Il published the work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifying the idea that preserving the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction is the basic principle to be maintained for accomplishing the socialist cause. He also indicated the tasks and ways to do so. 
					
					To thoroughly preserve the Juche character and national character is an important issue in the present era, the article says, and goes on:
					
					Preserving the Juche character and national character is a fundamental guarantee for firmly protecting the independent dignity of the country and the nation.
					
					Independence was the revolutionary faith, method and practice that the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il cherished and thoroughly embodied all their lives. 
					
					The invincibility of Korean-style socialism lies in that it regards the independence as its eternal life and soul.
					
					The principle of independence firmly preserved by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for decades is being steadfastly carried forward under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Under the leadership of the great party, the Korean people have kept their feet firmly planted on this land and looked out over the world and created new and advanced things in the Korean style from the Juche-oriented stand whatever they produce.
					
					Preserving the Juche character and national character is an important requirement for glorifying the nature of socialism.
					
					It is the Juche character and national character that serve as a treasured sword for firmly preserving the nature of socialism based on collectivism.
					
					The Juche character and national character are the eternal soul of the Korean people and a powerful ideological and spiritual weapon in the struggle to achieve a final victory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Redeployment of Its Biochemical Unit in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Redeployment of Its Biochemical Unit in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the 23rd chemical battalion of the U.S. Army was deployed in the 2nd division of the U.S. imperialists' aggressor forces present in south Korea.
					The unit belonging to the U.S. 19th Battlefield-supporting Command had been present in a U.S. base in Chilgok of North Kyongsang Province till 2004. But it was transferred to the U.S. mainland.
					
					Rodong Sinmun on Friday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					This is a revelation of the U.S. forces' criminal scenario to impose nuclear and biochemical disasters upon the Korean nation.
					
					As for the unit, it earned an ill fame in the Korean War.
					
					The redeployment of the unit is an open declaration of a biochemical war against the DPRK.
					
					The dark clouds of biochemical war are now hanging over the Korean Peninsula. This brings to light the deceptive and criminal nature of the call made by the U.S. for "banning the use of WMDs and their non-proliferation" whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					
					Clear is the reason why the U.S. redeployed such unit all of a sudden. It seeks to successfully carry out its policy towards the DPRK even by use of biochemical weapons which proved powerful and effective in battlefields for aggression.
					
					The U.S. military confrontation with the DPRK is like a gamble on which it stakes its fate.
					
					The DPRK has nothing to fear even if the U.S. lays an international military siege to it and comes in attack after prodding the UNSC into cooking up unreasonable "resolutions" infringing upon its sovereignty.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to properly know that the DPRK is not what it used to be in 1950.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Chieftain of Genocide
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Chieftain of Genocide
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined commentary blasts the U.S. for conducting a dangerous germ experiment at a base in Georgia recently.
					This secret military experimental base disguised as a public health centre was established and has been operated by germ experts with the financial backing of the U.S. Department of Defense for the purpose of developing bacteriological weapons, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					The U.S. is the chieftain of genocide and the worst rogue state in the world as it conducted such horrible test even in other country for fear of protest in its own country.
					
					It went on:
					
					The U.S. is a criminal state which developed germ weapons long ago and used them in actual battles.
					
					The U.S. imperialists waged the largest-ever germ warfare in Korea, unprecedented in the world war history.
					
					There are too many instances to cite as regards massacres being committed by the U.S. worldwide.
					
					The prison in the U.S. Navy base on Guantanamo has become a proverb fully disclosing the criminal nature of the U.S. as a medieval torture center, germ testing ground and a scene of human rights abuses.
					
					No country in the world is so vociferous about "protecting human rights" as the U.S.
					
					It is the U.S. which openly conducts germ tests, puts prisoners to torture and kills them after setting up hell-like centers for germ test and jails in other countries. Such atrocities are a challenge and insult to the world public which considers respect for human rights as an elementary requirement.
					
					The U.S. is the arch criminal which should stand trial at a world human rights court.
					
					It should admit the human rights abuses perpetrated by it in  many wars of aggression  in the past including the Korean War and those being committed in various other parts of the world, operation of germ test bases and development of lethal weapons and bear legal responsibility for them, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea's Moves for New War Mechanism Flayed
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea's Moves for New War Mechanism Flayed
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean authorities are mulling setting up a "combined field command" to replace the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command. Minju Joson Friday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					This is a cunning ploy mocking and insulting the Korean nation and the world public demanding the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					The Korean nation has waged persistent struggle to get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea. After the lapse of nearly four decades since the UN General Assembly session adopted a resolution on pulling the U.S. forces out of south Korea, the world public is becoming increasingly vocal for implementing it.
					
					Under the pressure of public at home and abroad, the U.S. transferred the right to command peacetime operation to the south Korean puppet forces. The transfer of the right to command wartime operation may lead to the dissolution of the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" and the U.S. forces will lose the justification to remain in south Korea. Proceeding from this, the U.S. is mulling setting up a new war mechanism so-called "combined field command" to replace the "Combined Forces Command" in a bid to keep its forces in south Korea and put the puppet army under its control.
					
					The post of the command which the U.S. promised to bestow on the puppet forces is in name only. Such core elements as commanding right to information, operation and military supplies and tactical and commanding system are set to be controlled by the U.S. commander.
					
					The U.S. is working to let the puppet forces hold the post of commander and instead impose lots of burdens to bear on them as it is suffering from unprecedented serious financial crisis.
					
					In the meantime, the puppet forces have been intent on keeping the U.S. forces in south Korea while offering a large amount of fund in a bid to do harm to fellow countrymen with their help.
					
					The U.S. and the puppet forces' efforts to establish the new war mechanism is exactly aimed to serve these interests.

articles.title: Crimes Committed by U.S. Forces and Their Cohorts Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crimes Committed by U.S. Forces and Their Cohorts Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Crimes committed by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea and their cohorts  were disclosed recently, sparking off a furor.
					They illegally operated a gambling house in their military base in Ryongsan, drawing south Korean inhabitants and raking up enormous profits. 
					
					They earned a lot of money and properties by promising those jobless people to help them get jobs, while illegally selling drugs.
					
					Society and people are falling sick owing to the above-said crimes.

articles.title: Crimes Committed by Prosecution under Fire in South Korea
articles.content:
Crimes Committed by Prosecution under Fire in South Korea
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea on June 16 released a report disclosing the crimes committed by the prosecution during traitor Lee Myung Bak's rule.
					The report noted that Lee appointed all chief secretaries for civil administration of Chongwadae who once held posts of chief prosecutors, letting them exercise enormous influence on the prosecution.
					
					Almost half of the key posts of the Ministry of Justice and the Prosecution were taken by prosecutors hailing from Taegu, North Kyongsang Province and Korea University, who were related to Lee, it added.
					
					The report also dealt with such data as power abuses by the prosecution, the cases which sparked uproar due to the prosecution's  wrong investigation, illegal acts committed by the public prosecutor general, the minister of Justice and those who were nominated as candidates for the posts and specific information about those prosecutors who were punished for their involvement in scandals.
					
					Citing such data, the organization said: The present chief executive made a proposal for the reform of the prosecution, but she appointed a one time prosecutor as chief secretary for civil administration of Chongwadae, putting the prosecution power under her control.

articles.title: S. Korean Inhabitant Sentenced to Prison Term
articles.content:
S. Korean Inhabitant Sentenced to Prison Term
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Jonju District Court of south Korea sentenced a middle school woman teacher to a prison term on charges of violation of the ill-famed "Security Law" on June 18, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					The court upheld the decision made at the first trial, bringing against her the charge that she posted on her computer articles praising and supporting the DPRK on over 30 occasions in a little over one year from February, 2009.
					
					Much upset by the desire to achieve reunification through an alliance with the north growing strong among the south Korean internet users, the authorities are becoming more desperate in their campaign to crack down upon them, talking about "threat to order of liberal democracy" and "acts profiting the enemy".

articles.title: DPRK's Efforts for National Reunification Supported by Russian Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Efforts for National Reunification Supported by Russian Political Party
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia made public a statement on June 15, the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					The statement said that the DPRK's policy for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country as early as possible has exercised a great influence.
					
					It went on:
					
					Thanks to the devoted efforts of leader Kim Jong Il, the struggle of the Korean nation for the country's reunification made dynamic progress despite the moves of disturbers at home and abroad. 
					
					The Korean people's struggle to implement the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification has developed on a higher stage in the new century of Juche as supreme leader Kim Jong Un has pursued a clairvoyant policy.
					
					The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia expresses full support for the DPRK's peace initiative and stand and efforts to develop the inter-Korean relations and achieve national reunification on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					We call upon all Koreans in the north, south and overseas to unite and hasten the historic advance for reunification.

articles.title: DPRK Is Bulwark of Peace: Swedish Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Is Bulwark of Peace: Swedish Organization
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association posted on its website an article "Great victory -- continuing war" with a photo of President Kim Il Sung on June 12 to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War). 
					The article said that the Korean people would significantly celebrate the diamond jubilee, adding:
					
					The Korean people beat back the U.S. imperialists' moves to invade the young DPRK and occupy the whole of Korea. 
					
					The gunfire of the war stopped but the U.S. imperialists still have the ambition for aggression and check the reunification of Korea, violating the sovereignty of the Korean nation. 
					
					Since long before, the DPRK has made consistent efforts to thwart the nuclear threat from the U.S. and make the Korean Peninsula denuclearized. 
					
					The DPRK made a decision to counter fire with fire and strength with strength and defend its sovereignty and prosperity with nukes. 
					
					The DPRK is the bulwark of peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the region.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Appeal Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Appeal Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted the appeal "Let Us Usher in a Fresh Heyday on All the Fronts of Socialist Construction by Creating the Speed on Masik Pass", the appeal sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un to all service personnel and people of the DPRK, on its website on June 14.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Highly Praised by Bangladeshi Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Highly Praised by Bangladeshi Figure
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League who doubles as chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre, released a statement on June 14 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					He highly praised Kim Jong Il for performing distinguished exploits in party building and activities for nearly half a century since his start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					He went on:
					
					It was thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il that the WPK could become a powerful party remaining strongly independent in its stand despite all sorts of storms and stresses and trials of history.
					
					He expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK would surely achieve shining successes in their struggle for defending socialism and building a reunified and prosperous nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Indonesian and Romanian personages made public statements on June 13 to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					Shapril Arsiyad, chairman of the Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions, said that the June 15 joint declaration is the banner for independent national reunification to be held aloft by all Koreans and a landmark for Korea's reunification. 
					
					He expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve national reunification as early as possible and attain lasting peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, said that the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration is to solve the issue of reunification independently and peacefully through the great national unity of the north and the south of Korea. 
					
					However, in recent years the south Korean authorities have pursued confrontation in disregard of all the agreements between the north and the south in violation of the spirit of the joint declaration, he said, and went on:
					
					The U.S. should take hands off south Korea, first of all, in order to preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					Now the U.S. forces in south Korea have become the source of a war on the peninsula. 
					
					The just cause of the Korean people all out in the struggle against them is supported and encouraged by progressive mankind. 
					
					It is our conviction that the Korean people will defend peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification by embodying the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Beninese Political Figure Supports Korean People's Struggle for Protecting Sovereignty
articles.content:
Beninese Political Figure Supports Korean People's Struggle for Protecting Sovereignty
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, visited the DPRK embassy in Cotonou on June 14 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					He laid a bouquet before a full-length painting portraying President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					He said:
					
					Kim Jong Il consistently regarded independence, peace and friendship as a fundamental idea of external activities of the DPRK and paid deep attention to building an independent new world.
					
					He conducted energetic external activities to strengthen the anti-imperialist independent forces.
					
					I pay high tribute to Kim Jong Il, honorary president of the Socialist Party of Benin, with deep reverence and best wishes for his immortality.
					
					The WPK and the Korean people wisely led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un will surely win a victory in their just struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Indian Papers Laud Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Indian Papers Laud Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Indian newspapers carried special write-ups interwoven with photos of undying exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on June 13 to mark the 49th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The Indian and World Event in an article titled "Eternal general secretary of WPK" said:
					
					The idea and line of General Secretary Kim Jong Il serve as eternal guidelines of the WPK. 
					
					From the start of his work at the C.C., the WPK, he had exerted great efforts for developing the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea, as required by the times and the developing revolution. 
					
					The theory of Songun politics enunciated by him serves as a banner of victory as it helps firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation and preserve independence of the popular masses with the imperialists' policy of strength becoming evermore undisguised. 
					
					He bolstered up the defence capability in every way and, on this basis, put forth the theory of building a thriving socialist nation, carving out rosier future for the people. 
					
					He is always alive with the invincible WPK leading the general advance of the Korean people for building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					The Fashion India carried an article titled "Great leader of the mother party".

articles.title: Korean People's War Victory Day to Be Celebrated in Belarus
articles.content:
Korean People's War Victory Day to Be Celebrated in Belarus
Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- A Belarusian preparatory committee was formed in Minsk on June 14 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					L. Shukolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Committee of the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					The preparatory committee consists of the representatives of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, International Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party" and the National Social Association "For Democracy, Social Progress and Justice". 
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including meeting and film show on the occasion of the anniversary.

articles.title: Turistas chinos quedan encantados por el paisaje del monte Kumgang
articles.content:
Turistas chinos quedan encantados por el paisaje del monte Kumgang
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los miembros del segundo grupo de turismo internacional Rason-monte Kumgang a bordo del barco "Estrella Real" realizaron el turismo a ese monte pintoresco. 
					Los turistas chinos quedaron fascinados al ver las cordilleras, acantilados gigantescos y el paisaje de mil formas. 
					
					Cui Longzhe, proveniente de la ciudad de Yanji de la provincia de Jilin de China, dijo:
					
					El ano pasado estuve con mis amigos en el monte Chilbo de Corea. Fue muy impresionante su paisaje. 
					
					Hoy recorri los alrededores de la laguna Kuryong del monte Kumgang tan hermoso y elegante como el Chilbo. 
					
					Es muy emocionante el monte gigantesco y agua cristalina.
					
					Hemos tomado alli banos termales. 
					
					Gao Guiqing, medica de la ciudad de Yanji, destaco:
					
					Fue muy alegre el alpinismo. Todos los turistas estan muy contentos no solo por el medioambiente sino tambien por los servicios. 
					
					Las servidoras son muy amables y apasionadas. 
					
					Vendre a menudo a este monte pintoresco con muchos pinos. Yo prefiero los pinos del monte Kumgang.
					
					Wang Zhaowei, proveniente de la ciudad de Yanji, dijo:
					
					Es muy atractivo el paisaje pintoresco natural del monte Kumgang. Volvere a visitarlo otra vez. A traves de estas oportunidades, se estrecharan mas los lazos de amistad China-Corea.

articles.title: Minju Joson rechaza fabricacion de nuevo aparato de guerra en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson rechaza fabricacion de nuevo aparato de guerra en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- El periodico Minju Joson publico este viernes un comentario individual denunciando el proposito de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea de instalar la "comandancia combinada en el campo de combate" que reemplazara la "comandancia de las fuerzas aliadas" Sur de Corea-EE.UU. 
					El comentario lo califica de una artimana astuta que burla e insulta a la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional que demandan la retirada de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y continua: 
					
					La nacion coreana libra con dinamismo durante varios decenios la lucha por expulsar a las tropas yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Hace cerca de 40 anos, fue aprobada en la Asamblea General de la ONU la resolucion sobre la retirada de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del suelo surcoreano. Desde entonces, se alzan cada dia mas en ambito mundial las voces en demanda de ejecutarla. 
					
					Por no poder resistir a la presion de la opinion publica interna y externa, EE.UU. devolvio a los titeres surcoreanos el mando de operaciones en el tiempo ordinario. En el caso que el imperio traslade hasta el mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra, se disolvera la "comandancia de las fuerzas combinadas" Sur de Corea-EE.UU. y perderan las tropas norteamericanas el pretexto de su presencia en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Por esta razon, EE.UU. intenta instalar un nuevo aparato de guerra llamado "comandancia combinada en el campo de combate", en lugar de la existente "comandancia de las fuerzas combinadas", mantener la presencia de sus tropas en el suelo surcoreano y controlar a su antojo al ejercito titere surcoreano. 
					
					Solo de nombre, EE.UU. concedera el cargo del comandante a los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					En la nueva "comandancia combinada" el mando sobre las informaciones, operaciones y asuntos militares, el sistema automatico para el mando tactico, etc. estan bajo el control del subcomandante norteamericano.
					
					En estos momentos el imperio norteamericano sufre una grave crisis financiera, debido a lo cual intenta conceder a los titeres surcoreanos el cargo del comandante e imponerles mucho mas cargas. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos, a su vez, quieren mantener la presencia de las tropas yanquis y danar a la parte connacional, aunque malgastan mucho mas fondos. 
					
					Como vemos, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos pretenden instalar un nuevo aparato de guerra partiendo de sus respectivos intereses.

articles.title: ACNC critica disparates de Anonymous
articles.content:
ACNC critica disparates de Anonymous
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, el grupo internacional de hackers Anonymous perora fanfarroneada tomando por blanco de ataque cibernetico la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Este grupo declaro que con motivo del 25 de junio que viene librara el ataque de hacking a titulo de "operacion de infiltracion al interior del Norte" y que eso podra atentar el sistema de la RPDC.
					
					Es absurdo el que tal grupo de los fulanos y menganos intenta manifestar su capacidad tecnica atentando atrevidamente el sistema de la RPDC.
					
					Ellos fijaron como el blanco de terror cibernetico la RPDC a que presta atencion el mundo para que la existencia de su grupo rechazado en escala mundial sea reconocida por parte de todas las personas.
					
					Con el insignificante programa de hacking de que cualquier hombre puede elaborarlo, perpetraron el ataque de hacking a los computadores servidores publicos de la RPDC que no tienen datos secretos y lo califican de gran proeza tecnica.
					
					Lo mas problematico es que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos que actuan con frenesi al aislamiento y aplastamiento politicos, militares y economicos y la penetracion ideologica y cultural anti-RPDC participaron en la campana de terror cibernetico en contubernio con ese grupo de hackers.
					
					No es la cosa casual que Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo y otros medios conservadores de prensa del Sur de Corea publican uno tras otro los actos hostiles anti-RPDC de las escorias humanas.
					
					Tales hechos muestran que Anonymous no es el simple grupo de hackers sino el grupo terrorista internacional, servidor politico de las fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC que manipulan por detras EE.UU. y el organo de inteligencia del Sur de Corea.
					
					De hecho, este grupo no sabe nada sobre la RPDC.
					
					No existe ahora en nuestro pais la red "Kwangmyong" de que ellos hablan como si fuera infiltrado.
					
					A pesar de esto, ellos inducen en error la opinion publica con los datos que no valen nada, presentados por EE.UU. y el organo de inteligencia titere del Sur de Corea como si fuera revelado el secreto.
					
					Anonymous usa como el arma de terror contra un Estado especial la tecnologia informatica, poderoso medio del desarrollo culto de la humanidad, lo cual es la grave provocacion que viola la soberania y la dignidad de un Estado soberano y es un desafio abierto a la sociedad internacional que desea usar las creaciones de la ciencia moderna por el desarrollo independiente de los paises y naciones y el bienestar de la humanidad.
					
					El mundo vera claramente como sufriran la amarga el grupo Anonymous y las fuerzas hostiles que lo controlan por detras.
